item.title: Mindscratch Newsletter 1
item.author: codecraig@gmail.com (Craig Wickesser)
item.description: On a regular basis, hopefully once per week, I’ll be posting links to content related to distributed systems, programming and devops. If you’d prefer to access this content via email, then subscribe. http://www.meetup.com/Apache-Mesos-NYC-Meetup/events/219073804/ - interesting b/c of mention of running Accumulo on Mesos http://www.slideshare.net/ColleenLee1/iguaz-a-longrunning-job-scheduler-using-docker-and-mesos - job scheduler from corsera Docker security https://github.com/GDSSecurity/Docker-Secure-Deployment-Guidelines https://www.gartner.com/doc/2956826 https://github.com/ExPHAT/twitter-sort http://am./chronos –master zk://server1:2181/mesos –zk_hosts zk://server1:2181/mesos –http_port 8080bari.apache.org/ http://jpetazzo.github.io/2015/01/13/docker-mount-dynamic-volumes/ https://codeascraft.com/2015/01/14/introducing-statsd-jvm-profiler-a-jvm-profiler-for-hadoop/ Go Go Static Analysis Tools by Alan Donovan https://vimeo.
